blogPost.excerpt: Meet Maya your virtual assistant for entrepreneurs. Maya will be running tasks, listening, and communicating on what you need to grow your idea. She will keep you up to date on your current progress and provide the next step you need to take.
blogPost.body: Meet Maya your virtual assistant for entrepreneurs. Maya will be running tasks, listening, and communicating on what you need to grow your idea. She will keep you up to date on your current progress and provide the next step you need to take.
blogPost.title: Maya Ai - The virtual assistant for entrepreneurs and startups
blogPost.author: Shivam Ramphal

localize.description: 认识一下您的创业者虚拟助理Maya。玛雅将负责执行任务，倾听并沟通您发展想法所需的内容。她会让您了解您当前的进展，并提供您需要采取的下一步措施。
localize.tagline: 创业者和初创企业的虚拟助理。

localize.description: 認識一下您的創業者虛擬助理Maya。瑪雅將負責執行任務，傾聽並溝通您發展想法所需的內容。她會讓您瞭解您當前的進展，並提供您需要採取的下一步措施。
localize.tagline: 創業者和初創企業的虛擬助理。

previous.excerpt: Do what matters most. Daily Four is all about getting the important things done with minimal stress. Reflect on your past achievements whenever you need a dose of perspective.

localize.description: 做最重要的事。每日四点就是要用最小的压力完成重要的事情。每当你需要透视的时候，就反思一下你过去的成就。
做最重要的事。每日四點就是要用最小的壓力完成重要的事情。每當你需要透視的時候，就反思一下你過去的成就。
